name: Cruel Angel's Simulator
description:
A short visual novel about taking care of a stray cat... with all of its weird and mysterious consequences.

Features:

  • A fluffy tabby cat that you can name,
  • Cute and funky visuals,
  • Lovecraftian (??) narrative,
  • Three unique endings with amazing CGs.

Created using Visual Novel Maker for the Cat-astrophe Game Jam 2022 by Ada Matejek, Asia Lipinska, Kasia Lipinska and Vlada Kot.
